titles: Not fear, but love a sermon preached before the governors of the Charity for Relief of Poor Widows and Orphans of Clergy-men, at St. Mary le Bow, on the 7th day of Decemb., 1682 / by Ar. Bury ...
author: Bury, Arthur, 1624-1713.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Cambridge.
